    • Field Detail

      • displayHandler

        public static DisplayHandler displayHandler

      • RESIZING_ENABLED

        public static final boolean RESIZING_ENABLED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • running

        public static boolean running
        Whether or not the game is running. If this is false, the game loop will stop after the current iteration of the loop and the game will shut down.

      • guiList

        public static java.util.Stack<GuiMenu> guiList
        ALL rendering and ticking, besides REALLY basic stuff goes through here. Even in-game!

      • artLoader

        public static ArtLoader artLoader

      • componentList

        public static InsertableComponentList componentList

    • Method Detail

      • getDeltaWheel

        public static int getDeltaWheel()
        How much the mouse wheel has moved since the last tick.

      • getEditor

        public static GuiEditor getEditor()
        Returns the topmost instance of the Editor in the Gui Stack.
        Returns:
        Instance of GuiEditor, or null if none exist.

      • getFPS

        public static int getFPS()

      • getGame

        public static Remote2DGame getGame()
        The current instance of Remote2DGame.
        See Also:
        Remote2DGame

      • getIntegerKeyboardList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getIntegerKeyboardList()
        The same thing as getKeyboardList() except it contains LWJGL's integer index of that character instead of Java's Character class.
        See Also:
        Keyboard.isKeyDown(int)

      • getJarPath

        public static java.io.File getJarPath()

      • getKeyboardList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> getKeyboardList()
        A list of all keys that have been pressed this tick. NOTE: This does NOT include keys that are held down. Use Keyboard.isKeyDown(int) for seeing if keys are held down.

      • getLimitedKeyboardList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> getLimitedKeyboardList()
        A limited list of all keys that have been pressed this tick. Similar to getKeyboardList(), however this only counts keys that are included in allowedChars:

      • getMap

        public static Map getMap()
        Finds the best version of the map by scanning through all available GUIs. The first one that it finds (starting from the top of the stack) that implements MapHolder is assumed to be the most plausible map to use.
        Returns:
        The Map on the top of the stack.

      • getMouseCoords

        public static Vector2 getMouseCoords()
        The current coordinates of the mouse on-screen. This is the same thing as i and j in tick(int, int, int). Useful if mouse coordinates are needed while rendering.
        NOTE: You MUST use this instead of Mouse.getX() and Mouse.getY() due to the fact that

      • getMouseDown

        public static int getMouseDown()
        If the mouse has been pressed. This is the same thing as k in tick(int, int, int). Useful if mouse button state is needed while rendering.

      • hasMouseBeenPressed

        public static boolean hasMouseBeenPressed()
        Returns:
        True if the mouse button has been pressed this tick (NOT held down, just pressed). Otherwise, false.

      • hasMouseBeenReleased

        public static boolean hasMouseBeenReleased()
        Returns:
        True if the mouse button has been released this tick. Otherwise, false.

      • startRemote2D

        public static void startRemote2D(Remote2DGame game)
        Starts Remote2D. This initializes all engine-related tasks, opens up the display, and gets your game up and running.
        Parameters:
        game - This game's Remote2DGame instance.
        See Also:
        Remote2DGame

      • tick

        public static void tick(int i,
        int j,
        int k)
